Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the creation of a land bank in N.Y. city
Summary: Creates a land bank in a city with eight million or more residents by adoption of a local law by the city council; limits board membership to eleven members.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to the creation of a land bank in a city with eight million or more residents by adoption of a local law by the city council
